# CWRMmonitor

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

R package providing graphical and computational tools to guide parameter choice for the cluster weighted robust model. Associated paper Cappozzo, Garcìa Escudero, Greselin, Mayo-Iscar (2022) Graphical and computational tools to guide parameter choice for the cluster weighted robust model. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/10618600.2022.2154218](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/10618600.2022.2154218)

## Installation

You can install the development version of CWRMmonitor from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("AndreaCappozzo/CWRMmonitor")
```

## Package usage

A tutorial on how to use the package can be found in the supplementary material of Cappozzo, Garcìa Escudero, Greselin, Mayo-Iscar (2022) Graphical and computational tools to guide parameter choice for the cluster weighted robust model.
